body:
No, before you say it, I have not been demoted. It was my choice, so technically I retired. But this is not forever.

At the current time I am going through a hard time / situation and I am not able to do my job as a mod. For the time being I am "off-duty" so my rank has been removed. When this current situation is over, I will regain my role and join back the staff team.

Thank you to all the people that have stuck with me and supported me in the current time. The community here is just amazing. <3
body_tagged:
